item.title: Russian drones strike Ukraine after Trump expresses anger at attacks
item.description: President Donald Trump again on Monday expressed frustration with Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin as Russian strikes on Ukraine continued.

item.title: Uncertainty over certification affects possible 9/11-related illnesses coverage
item.description: Advocates claim HHS has paused consideration of new claims. HHS denies this.

item.title: European, Iranian diplomats hold last-minute talks ahead of sanctions deadline
item.description: Representatives from Britain, France, and Germany are set to hold last-minute talks with Iran in Geneva

item.title: WATCH: Cracker Barrel faces backlash over rebranding
item.description: Cracker Barrel is facing backlash after rolling out its redesigned interiors and new logo.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events
